title: Foundry Sans
content:
Hello,

I know this font is Foundry Sans, but it is a little expensive so I need to find some alternatives.  
Help please!

Thank you so much.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422033451im_/http:/typophile.com/files/type_5856.jpg)

author: misalion
